thread.title: Users across Britain report problems with Facebook | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Users across Britain report problems with Facebook | Daily Mail Online

author: Alex Matthews For Mailonline
title: Users across Britain report problems with Facebook | Daily Mail Online
text: comments Facebook users across Britain and Europe have reported problems with getting access to their news feeds. People logging on to the social media giant have been complaining in their droves that they can't see the latest comings and goings of friends and followers, with many relying on Twitter to vent their frustration. There has yet to be an official statement from Facebook on the outage but figures from the website Down Detector show the problem began just after 9am today. It is believed over 1,000 complaints were made by angry Facebookers, frustrated by by the interruption to their social media fix. Facebook users across Britain and Europe have reported problems with getting access to their news feeds RELATED ARTICLES
